Welcome!

Before using the app you need to configure mopidy and this app.

This tutorial will help you to get started.

You can swipe to move between the next or previous step.

Change your mopidy config (~/.config/mopidy/mopidy.conf) and set:

[http]
enabled = true
hostname = 0.0.0.0
port = [portnumber]

You can choose the [portnumber] you want (default is 6680) but you must write it here:
Set a name to this server. You can set any name you want:
Find the IP address where mopidy is running (ifconfig can be helpull) and write it here:

Congratulations!

The app has connected to mopidy successfully.

You can now use the app.

Remenber you can use the share button on spotify and select email, this app will show as an option.

You can also use Youtube share button
